meanings.definition: A decorative cloth hanging in front of an altar.
meanings.sent1: The church had beautiful antependiums adorning the altar.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest adjusted the antependiums to make them look perfect.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to hide behind the antependiums during the service.
meanings.sent4: The colorful antependiums seemed to dance in the sunlight, bringing life to the altar.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the antependiums captured everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The church ordered new antependiums for the upcoming events.
meanings.sent2: The antependiums were carefully stored in the church's storage room.
meanings.sent3: The antependiums were so numerous that they filled the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The antependiums lined up in a row, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering antependiums added a touch of elegance to the altar.
